title: Supreme Court to Decide If Sony Can Force ISPs to Cut Your Internet Over Piracy
description: The Sony Music Entertainment-led lawsuit against Cox Communications forces the question: should Internet providers be allowed to shut down a person’s internet access if they fail to block repeat music pirates? The U.S. Supreme Court is now weighing that exact…
